Articles.Content:
For those who don't know, Maxmaps will be making his final Squadcast appearance tonight.

The stream starts just about five hours after this posting and can be found at this link.

Happy landings, Miguel!

For those who don't know, Maxmaps will be making his final Squadcast appearance tonight.

The stream starts just about five hours after this posting and can be found at this link.

Happy landings, Miguel!

Huh? Why is he quitting? And is anyone going to replace him?

I refer you to this Farewell thread. That is all the info I have.

Happy landings!
Ugh.. I hope it was his own decision and not squad deciding to replace him with "new blood" like they have done so many times in the past.
